TopicTitle: I've seen a lot of strange Kerbal names before, but this one takes the cake by far

Articles.Content: I just... I don't know what to do... I don't think I should trust him
And here I thought all Kerbals lived in harmony.

And here I thought all Kerbals lived in harmony.

so did I...

Now I'm not so sure
It's Kolonel Klink!
"We have met the Enemy and he is... green?"
oh him, he had an ID card, hes on the maintenance crew. let him in. he mentioned something about a booster fuel leak, so he needs time alone to work on it.
I'm just relieved that he's low on courage and high on stupidity. That could have been far worse.
That's right up there with Danger Kerman. I send Danger on all my...safe missions...
I recently hired Ellie Kerman, the first Kerbal I've seen with a distinctly, unmistakably female name. There have been a lot of ambiguous ones, but I've never heard of a guy named Ellie.

I recently hired Ellie Kerman, the first Kerbal I've seen with a distinctly, unmistakably female name. There have been a lot of ambiguous ones, but I've never heard of a guy named Ellie.

I have an Elley Kerman and a Seerie Kerman. I have the texture replacer mod so I can give them female faces

His stupidity is far too high for him to ever deceive you.

Send him in orbit around Jool just to be sure, though.
You could see if you can recruit Bilbo, Samwise, and Merry Kerman. They're very keen on testing out the effects of solar impact on stack decouplers, for some reason.

Danger Kerman.

Oh my Jebus. This is amazing! "Oh, 'Danger' is your middle name, huh? Wuss, it's my first name!"

Only a Kerbal.
Oh boy, now I fear someone worse than Jebediah.

This is the reason I wish I could reject applicants in the recruitment complex (or hire and fire them) so I could constantly get new applicants that I can browse for the most interesting and funny names

This is the reason I wish I could reject applicants in the recruitment complex (or hire and fire them) so I could constantly get new applicants that I can browse for the most interesting and funny names

You can reject them. It involves a ship with a large crew capacity and a rapid planned disassembly.
I've got Martin Kerman. Welp, I'm Martin. Needless to say I take myself on every new important mission.

I've got Martin Kerman. Welp, I'm Martin. Needless to say I take myself on every new important mission.

Your second name isn't Stu, is it?

You can reject them. It involves a ship with a large crew capacity and a rapid planned disassembly.

But they keep coming back! Freaking zombies I swear.

Looking forward to .24's easy way to toggle permadeath.

German Kerman. I landed him in Argentina so he can have his fun.

Too soon?

Edited July 16, 2014 by NFUN

Your second name isn't Stu, is it?

Nope, I don't know what my second name is.
My last Gemini mission was crewed by the brothers Harley and Davidson Kerman.
There used to be a Dildo Kerman, but they removed him because of... reasons...

There used to be a Dildo Kerman, but they removed him because of... reasons...

There's a town not too far from where I live called that. Minus the Kerman, of course.
I had Sherlock Kerman investigate Laythe in my last save before the current one.
